#summary MinGW Build Environment

MPlayer and its libraries are built using [http://www.mingw.org MinGW] & MSYS, a minimal Unix-like shell for Windows require to build libraries on Windows. The GCC version used is 4.6.3.

A complete build environment and sources for libraries/utilities used in MPlayer is available at the following URL: [http://sourceforge.net/projects/smplayer/files/MinGW/mplayer]

Extract and edit `MinGW\msys\etc\fstab` according to where you extracted it. Launch the MSYS shell by executing `MinGW\msys\msys.bat`.
